channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
ok i am very new to this. and im trying to start my own server. well i saw some turtorials on youtube and on this. but the problem is when i downloaded a source and the client and edit my jdk version and stuff it give me this error. This is what it look like when i click runclient on the source: "Starting server on port: 43594 [Ge Prices loaded] [GrandExchange] - Loaded Offers"
and on the client file when i click run this error also appers: "'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . ."
please help!! or email me at lakersfan700@yahoo.com

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Stop posting this, this is your 3rd topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

ok i am very new to this. and im trying to start my own server. well i saw some turtorials on youtube and on this. but the problem is when i downloaded a source and the client and edit my jdk version and stuff it give me this error. This is what it look like when i click runclient on the source:
“Starting server on port: 43594
[Ge Prices loaded]
[GrandExchange] - Loaded Offers”

and on the client file when i click run this error also appers:
“‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .”

please help!! or email me at lakersfan700@yahoo.com

Read full topic
